dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, did you just read this? Twelve more aircraft by the end of the year? That's, uh, that's a lot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, did you just read this? Twelve more aircraft by the end of the year? That's, uh, that's a lot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the end of the year, 12 more aircraft are expected to be delivered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it is, right? It's all part of this bigger push for Kazakhstan's aviation market.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it is, right? It's all part of this bigger push for Kazakhstan's aviation market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But, like, why suddenly so many? And new planes too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, like, why suddenly so many? And new planes too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Chairman Tompieva, she just announced some new low-cost airlines are coming in 2025.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Chairman Tompieva, she just announced some new low-cost airlines are coming in twenty twenty five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chairman of the Civil Aviation Committee Saltanat Tompieva has named the low-cost airlines set to enter Kazakhstan™s aviation market in 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. So, like, who? Any big names?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. So, like, who? Any big names?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. We're talking South Korea's T'way and Eastar Jet, India's SpiceJet, and AirAsia X from Thailand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. We're talking South Korea's T'way and Eastar Jet, India's SpiceJet, and AirAsia X from Thailand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among them are the South Korean low-cost carriers T™way and Eastar Jet, India™s SpiceJet, and Thailand™s AirAsia X.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, international carriers. So, um, that means more flights, more competition, I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, international carriers. So, um, that means more flights, more competition, I guess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! More options for passengers, better prices hopefully. That's the whole point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! More options for passengers, better prices hopefully. That's the whole point.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the planes, though? Four already arrived, two for Air Astana, two for Fly Arystan, it says.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the planes, though? Four already arrived, two for Air Astana, two for Fly Arystan, it says.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since the beginning of this year, four planes have already arrived: two for Air Astana and two for Fly Arystan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, those are already here, getting that fleet younger, you know. It's a continuous process.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, those are already here, getting that fleet younger, you know. It's a continuous process.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our aircraft fleet is becoming younger every year, Tompieva informed the senators.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, all these new airlines coming, plus new planes for the existing ones. It's, uh, it's a huge expansion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, all these new airlines coming, plus new planes for the existing ones. It's, uh, it's a huge expansion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. They're making a big move to enhance their market and, you know, just expand everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. They're making a big move to enhance their market and, you know, just expand everything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, better for travelers then, I suppose?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, better for travelers then, I suppose?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. More choice, more seats, newer planes. It's a good thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. More choice, more seats, newer planes. It's a good thing.
